pr_title: GSoC'22: New CGAL's design to handle basic viewers
pr_body:
Fixes #6943

Mostafa Ashraf's GSoC 2022 Submission

Mentor: @gdamiand
GitHub Page: https://github.com/Mostafa-ashraf19
LinkedIn: [Mostafa Ashraf](https://www.linkedin.com/in/mostafa-ashraf-a62807142/)

##  Question

1. Regarding global functions, Would you like to use a different name for each data structure or overloaded function?
e.g.
   -  add_in_graphic_buffer_lcc();
    add_in_graphic_buffer_surface_mesh();
   - OR: add_in_graphic_buffer(); // overloading function

2. What do you think?
@sloriot, @lrineau, @gdamiand 

## Viewers Status

1. - [x] draw_face_graph.h
2. - [x]  draw_linear_cell_complex.h
3. - [x] draw_nef_3.h
4. - [x] draw_periodic_2_triangulation_2.h
5. - [x] draw_point_set_3.h 
6. - [x] draw_polygon_2.h
7. - [x] draw_polygon_with_holes_2.h
8. - [x] draw_simple_straight_skeleton_2.h
9. - [x] draw_face_graph_with_paths.h
10. - [x] draw_triangulation_2.h
11. - [x] draw_triangulation_3.h
12. - [x]  draw_voronoi_diagram_2.h
13. - [x] draw_surface_mesh_small_faces.h

## TODOs: 
@gdamiand 
 
- [ ] Add Custom KeyPressEvent SimpleSurfaceMeshWithSmallFacesViewerQt, `draw_surface_mesh_small_faces.h`.
- [ ] Continue Documenting the project.
- [ ] Solve bugs that might come after the PR review.
- [ ] Discuss with a mentor to add new viewers.
- [ ] Start to develop and use a new viewer, other than Qt.

In the previous code, the face color is a constant (return CGAL::IO::Color(73, 250, 117)) ?', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2022, 10, 6, 15, 15, 55, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'gdamiand', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 989197028, 'comment_body': 'Do you mean regarding continuously changing color? if so, I think we can pass a nonconst drawing_functor and change the internal functors for coloring(face, edge, vertex).

What do you think?', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2022, 10, 6, 15, 30, 35, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'Mostafa-ashraf19', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 989212448, 'comment_body': 'I think we need multiple changes for coloring, e.g. [Line:71](https://github.com/CGAL/cgal/blob/7404eb629fda75cefe6786c2ca625b05d036fe7c/Periodic_2_triangulation_2/include/CGAL/draw_periodic_2_triangulation_2.h#L71), [Line:85](https://github.com/CGAL/cgal/blob/7404eb629fda75cefe6786c2ca625b05d036fe7c/Periodic_2_triangulation_2/include/CGAL/draw_periodic_2_triangulation_2.h#L85), 
We change face color twice in line 71 and 85
[Line(s)111:114](https://github.com/CGAL/cgal/blob/7404eb629fda75cefe6786c2ca625b05d036fe7c/Periodic_2_triangulation_2/include/CGAL/draw_periodic_2_triangulation_2.h#L111). right?', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2022, 10, 6, 15, 44, 25, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'Mostafa-ashraf19', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 989232092, 'comment_body': 'Only the first color is a face color (line 71). The second color line 85 is for segments (you can keep the constant) and the third color is also for segments, and here again you can keep a constant (like in the current code).', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2022, 10, 6, 16, 2, 48, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'gdamiand', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 989234711, 'comment_body': 'I mean regarding the different key shortcuts used to display some specific elements. In your modifications, these shortcuts are for now removed. You can either re-introduce the class SimplePeriodic2Triangulation2ViewerQt to re-add these shortcurts, or maybe it is possible to add an external slot but I am not sure this is possible.',
